title: The Sky Is Pink
writer: Shonali Bose, Juhi Chaturvedi, Nilesh Maniyar
short_cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Farhan Akhtar, Zaira Wasim, Rohit Saraf
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Farhan Akhtar, Zaira Wasim, Rohit Saraf
genre: Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: After succumbing to her terminal illness, a teenager posthumously narrates her parents’ tenacious relationship in this drama based on a true story.
